attachments.text: A usability lab has always been at the top of our wish list as UX designers, but there were two major factors that made it difficult to achieve: 1) it would cost a fortune, and 2) it would require…

text: On topic of living lab recording.

attachments.title: Open Broadcaster Software | Home
attachments.text: Open Broadcaster Software is free and open source software for video recording and live streaming. Stream to Twitch, YouTube and many other providers or record your own videos with high quality H264 / AAC encoding.

text: Good option for capturing video for above stream: <http://a.co/6joBJEj>

text: Future remote video recording device this might be good. <https://www.blackmagicdesign.com/products/blackmagicmicrocinemacamera>

For next all hands/event having the capture card would be great and would work pretty well I think. We can use whatever camera that outputs HDMI and record from that and use OBS to broadcast via whatever.
Ok to buy $350 capture card <@U02918BKW>? Seems like a good option and have heard good things about it.
This seems like a decent option:  <http://a.co/eC4pLph>
